channel.title: Fab Friends on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Fab Friends on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jensen Huang Wants You to Know He’s Getting a Lot Out of the ‘Fantastic’ Nvidia-Intel Deal
item.description: Nvidia is investing $5 billion in Intel. The news comes after the US government took a roughly 10 percent equity stake in the struggling chipmaker.
